detaileddescription.para:
Mark all messages of the conversation as read
cr
The LinphoneChatRoom object corresponding to the conversation.

Gets nb_message most recent messages from cr chat room, sorted from oldest to most recent.
cr
The LinphoneChatRoom object corresponding to the conversation for which messages should be retrieved
nb_message
Number of message to retrieve. 0 means everything.
A list of LinphoneChatMessage objects. LinphoneChatMessage

Gets the partial list of messages in the given range, sorted from oldest to most recent.
cr
The LinphoneChatRoom object corresponding to the conversation for which messages should be retrieved
begin
The first message of the range to be retrieved. History most recent message has index 0.
end
The last message of the range to be retrieved. History oldest message has index of history size - 1 (use linphone_chat_room_get_history_size to retrieve history size)
A list of LinphoneChatMessage objects. LinphoneChatMessage

Delete a message from the chat room history.
cr
The LinphoneChatRoom object corresponding to the conversation.
msg
The LinphoneChatMessage object to remove.

Delete all messages from the history
cr
The LinphoneChatRoom object corresponding to the conversation.

Gets the number of unread messages in the chatroom.
cr
The "LinphoneChatRoom object corresponding to the conversation.
the number of unread messages.

Gets the number of messages in a chat room.
cr
The LinphoneChatRoom object corresponding to the conversation for which size has to be computed
the number of messages.
